job.title: Data Strategy Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtJefferies is seeking a Data Scientist to join the Data Strategy team within Equity ResearchltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilities Will IncludeltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWork closely with Head of Data Strategy in creation of fundamental models design of data tools coordination with global sector team evaluation of external alternative data vendors and adhoc research projectsltligtltligtInteract with key data partners to communicate business cases company drivers and other KPIs relevant to fundamental stock evaluationltligtltligtQuery transform combine and expand datasets to assist teams in knowledge extractionltligtltligtInterface with data vendors internal research teams internal sales and trading personnel and external institutional investorsltligtltligtConceive and executing on differentiated research projects across sectors and data types ltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtltugtKey Qualificationsltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt4 years of experience within consulting data research data science or similar rolesltligtltligtAdvanced STEM degree such as data science computer science engineering or statistics preferredltligtltligtPrior experience in a strategic quantitative or risk role is desirableltligtltligtDeep knowledge of data science programming languages is required such as R Python SQL ScalaltligtltligtKnowledge of cloud computing environments is helpfulltligtltligtKnowledge of fundamental financial modeling is not a must but helpfulltligtltligtKeen interest in the data economy within financial servicesltligtltligtMotivated intelligent curious hardworking team playerltligtltulgt
